definition: A device consisting of multiple colored lights arranged vertically, typically used to control and regulate vehicular and pedestrian traffic at intersections.

examples.german: Gehen Sie bei Grün über die Ampel.
examples.english: Cross the street when the traffic light is green.

examples.german: Die Ampel schaltet auf Gelb um.
examples.english: The traffic light changes to yellow.
The traffic light control improves traffic flow.
